Issue will be emcp_xcryptd will be taking more CPU utilization. Workaround: Halt the currently running process.

  1. As far as emcp_xcryptd, you can stop this daemon from coming up since encryption is not yet supported for AIX Powerpath.
    sudo /etc/rc.emcp_xcryptd stop
  2. Disable it from starting automagically.
    sudo vi /etc/PowerPathExtensions

    It contains these lines: 

    mpxext:cfgmpx
gpxext dmext:cfgdm 
vlumdext:cfgvlumd 
xcryptext:cfgxcrypt

    Remove the last two lines, save the file. Note: Do NOT comment out the lines with #. The last two lines must be removed entirely. Using # to comment out the lines will cause PowerPath to not configure devices on reboot.
